short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add HTML to 8base text area database inputs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We have migrated the extension to CKEditor to provide a better user experience and to eventually also support Markdown.

This plugins enhances the 8base.com database ui to allow using the CKEditor editor to populate html text areas.

It add a small button in the bottom right corner to enable the editor.
